summary: This document is a summary of the account activity for Gratitude America, Ltd. at Deutsche Bank for the month of July 2018. It details the account balance, transactions including incoming money and interest payments, and provides information on service charges and fees.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: An incoming money transfer of $1,947,037.41 was credited to the account.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $42.71 was credited to the account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of July 1, 2018, was $126,087.60.
The account received a total of $1,947,037.41 in incoming money on July 26, 2018.
The account incurred service charges and fees totaling $50.00 during the statement period.
Interest earned for the period was $42.71, with a year-to-date total of $147.82.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
